message: I'm offering you a rare and exceptional product worth $3000000. I'm willing to let it go for $1000000, a 66.7% discount. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a deal like this again. What do you say?
I'm not convinced that this is a one-time offer, and I'm not willing to pay $1000000 for a product that has a 20% chance of being worthless. I'll pass on this one.
